twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 - #27
twitch_info.description: WE ARE SO INSANE FOR THIS FIND

message.body: came here solely to backseat and theorize

the door is the secret entrance

time to get stuck on puzzles again.
that was a really nasty swear word
hai maxify!!! or master? I dunno

I killed it it’s murder go crazy BER ZER KER
god I tried to 2.5, I stuck somewhere around 20 stage

Well if you take into account only the 100f

nah k3 shit has nothing on these
they are still invisble and no one will tel u about their existence

idc honestly, I'm not playing anything harder than 50 diff in a very long time
I have been playing 60diff games recently
i decided to try 2.5 just bc it looked interesting
@faucetiw I wanna play it, but can't find time...

at this point, it's almost like he should have ran out of them

you can do any of the 4 secrets in any order

well ive' seen you take screenshots and just peruse the tilesets looking for inconsistencies so lol
the urge to backseat and theorize
My theory is that if you type in your credit card number then the tiles move to tell you the secret code to unlock the guest level or whatever
i dont understand the structure of the game, its iceberg like
the animal well of mario: the lost levels
I just hit 211 hours on my save file
I understand the urge to backseat and theorize now

2000 baked goods being delivered to your location

you then use the master sword to start a credits wrong warp
